entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Saint-Quentin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:09 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023
